storyInfo: After taking care of their 'comrades,' W, Hoederer, and Ines decide to split their forces. W and Ines meet first, exchanging words before crossing swords. At this time, the transport team quietly arrives.

attributes.content: Tsk... Those are the same goons as last time— How’d they find us here?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hurry up and retreat! Don’t waste time!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They’ve got us surrounded. And outnumbered.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Then we gotta find a way to break through!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Their scouts took out all our sentries. We’re in the dark here...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Bullshit! Are you gonna stand around and wait for their Casters to fry you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hey, you... You’re with Hoederer... What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Where’s Hoederer? And his men? He’s supposed to be—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Wh-what are you doing to my comms?! What gives—!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Would you shut up already?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Remember how I was on patrol here? That made it real easy to plant bombs all over your camp.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...You! Hoederer! You sold us out...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don’t make it sound so bad.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We’re headed out on a long, long trip. And wouldn’t you know it? Some guests showed up just as we’re leaving. So someone’s gotta stay behind to hold the fort.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Now if we leave some snacks out for our guests like a good host, maybe that’ll get them to stop chasing us?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Gotta say, I appreciate all you’re doing for us~
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Damn you... You knew they were coming the whole time... And you’re just going to leave us here to die—?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hmmm...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well, at least try to put up a bit of a fight. The more you struggle, the bigger our head start.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But seriously, thanks a kiloton.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I ordered you to help the teams that didn’t have time to escape, but...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Why didn’t anyone else make it out?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They volunteered to stay behind.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don’t worry. I left them a little gift... So they were more than happy to help us hold off the bad guys.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I doubt anyone here would be willing to sacrifice themselves.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No need to lie about it. Nobody’s going to blame you for sacrificing others to save your own squad.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But lying to your commander is another story.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You can’t fool my eyes, W. You’re on thin ice here.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Don’t forget how green you are.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...I’ll be sure to reflect upon my actions, Captain Ines.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Because we’ll be working together... for a very long time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, what’s the plan now?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No harm, no foul. What’s done is done, and it was probably going to turn out like this anyway.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: W might have made the right call.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Do you seriously believe that?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The Sarkaz over there have nothing to do with us.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Who they were, what they did. How they lived, how they died. None of our business.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Brutal.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Let’s talk work first. Ines, you and W split up and lead your teams away. Messengers stay radio silent, then regroup at the rendezvous point.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...I’ll catch up later.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...One more thing.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I don’t care what kind of mischief you get up to, how one of you exploits the other or whatever, but I won’t stand for you actually, directly fighting.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But indirectly is fine?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Pretty lax rules.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I really hope it doesn’t come to that. But it’s not like I could stop it either.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: For now, at least, if you plan to stay alive, make good use of every last Sarkaz you have.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hoederer has always been like this.
He thinks very little about what actually matters, and wastes so much brainpower on the pointless stuff.
...Nobody says W isn’t a great fighter. But there’s a lot she’s missing.
If she really is just an incredible Sarkaz warrior...
....Hmph.
It’s not even dark out. And you still gotta hide over here by the fire?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe you just like fire?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I definitely don’t like people bothering me.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Your team is three hours late.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That ambush... did you and Hoederer plan that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Go ask him.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: He doesn’t know anything about it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Then it must’ve been a coincidence. All mercs are a pain in the ass to deal with. You cross their path, and they’re gonna give you shit.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh, that’s all? Here I was worried Hoederer sold out my position.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You think that’s what he should’ve done?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How do you know we’re not lying to you?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You could’ve killed me a long time ago. Doing it now wouldn’t help much, would it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What were you doing before you found us?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Huh? After all we’ve been through, you’re giving me the job interview now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hoederer never asks about his people’s pasts. But I’m not Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yeah you’re a whole different species from us.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Are you looking for trouble here?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, 'Miss Ines' isn’t so good at close combat.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A lesson for you: If you want to live a little longer, don’t put all your eggs in one basket.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Every Sarkaz mercenary carries a sword.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Well color me surprised. All this time I thought that was your staff. But...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: —Oh, but you, a 'Sarkaz mercenary?'
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: —Tch...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I’m still pretty sure I’ve got you beat at close range, but... Hmm, I admit I got a little careless.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well, thanks. A scratch on the arm is a pretty cheap price for that lesson.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You and Hoederer are both pretty good at keeping your cards close to your chest.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I’d rather talk about you. High-profile mercenaries like you are pretty much all dead by now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You’ve made such big waves in such a short time, but I never heard anything about you before you joined us. That’s pretty suspicious.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And you came looking for Hoederer. Why?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You said it yourself.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: A lot of people in Kazdel are after his head.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You dropped that bomb pretty smoothly. Why’d you change your mind?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hmm... I figured I’d get what I want easier this way.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And what is it you want?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...None of your business.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You’re shook. How funny. Why not make something up to dodge the question?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Your Arts again?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Those damned eyes. My reasons have nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Same with my eyes.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What was that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...From the east. Something’s coming.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: There’s more than one squad, but only one of them’s the real deal. Hmph, they sure are cautious...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ehh, sounds like a pretty big gang. Just how many people did they hire?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Hoederer was right. This is going to be our biggest battle yet.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We’re heading into uncharted territory now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You scared?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hoederer should be here soon with his squad. Tell the Messenger to get back on comms.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don’t remember anyone putting you in charge. Don’t give me orders.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oooh, whoopsie...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You just keep guarding this campfire over here. I’ll head down to the camp and check on the situation.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That’s... Babel’s...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Sorry, had to take a little detour along the way. Ended up wasting a bit of time.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But it’s time for us to really get to work now.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Positions, everyone.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hm... And how you doing over there?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: A-okay.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Judging from the burnt grass and neatly-cleaved mud here, you two have been busy.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: C’mon, we were just sparring a little, as a warm up. Definitely not fighting or anything.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don’t worry. Next time, I’ll bury you where they’ll never find your body.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Just to reiterate, our job is simple. Don’t let anyone near our mark.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Eliminate anything in the canyon that looks at you sideways. Open fire on anyone who approaches.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Any questions?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So, where’s our destination?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can’t disclose that. This escort task is to be carried out in stages, and our mapped route has already been passed out. After we reach our destination in three days, someone will connect with us.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What are they transporting?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I also can’t— Wait, Ines.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It’s a breach of contract to use your Arts to probe the transport team. Don’t underestimate them! Stop right now!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You said they were a regular old transport team—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I... no, this is definitely a convoy that needs protection.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But this huge thing that they’re transporting... I’m only seeing a shadow...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...A landship? No, it’s...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...a skeleton?
attributes.name: Ines
